proscene
Class PSWorldConstraint

java.lang.Object
  proscene.PSConstraint
      proscene.PSAxisPlaneConstraint
          proscene.PSWorldConstraint

public class PSWorldConstraint
extends PSAxisPlaneConstraint

A PSAxisPlaneConstraint defined in the world coordinate system.

The PSAxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection() and PSAxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection() are expressed in the PSFrame world coordinate system (see PSFrame.referenceFrame()).

 PSQuaternion constrainRotation(PSQuaternion rotation, PSFrame frame)
          When PSAxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintType() is of type AXIS, constrain rotation to be a rotation around an axis whose direction is defined in the PSFrame world coordinate system by PSAxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection().
 processing.core.PVector constrainTranslation(processing.core.PVector translation, PSFrame frame)
          Depending on PSAxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintType(), constrain translation to be along an axis or limited to a plane defined in the PSFrame world coordinate system by PSAxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection().

public processing.core.PVector constrainTranslation(processing.core.PVector translation,

Depending on PSAxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintType(), constrain translation to be along an axis or limited to a plane defined in the PSFrame world coordinate system by PSAxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection().

constrainRotation

public PSQuaternion constrainRotation(PSQuaternion rotation,
                                      PSFrame frame)
When PSAxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintType() is of type AXIS, constrain rotation to be a rotation around an axis whose direction is defined in the PSFrame world coordinate system by PSAxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection().

Overrides:
